ai-patthana21.11:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.11:0.3_0: Transmigration is supremely acquisition, covetousness and calmness.
ai-patthana21.11:1.1_0: (It is) unconfused for the sake of preference, or for the sake of defilement, because of pollutants. Grounded on the skillful, causes, reasons.
ai-patthana21.11:1.1_1: (perfectional) don’t give rise to unprofitable thoughts. Skilled in defilement, he doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.11:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana21.11:2.1_0: (Only) without preference, or with defilement, she is not skilled in reasons, giving a cause, and unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana21.11:3.1_0: One who has no snareshing the teaching, or indicated by defilement, by reasoning causes and reasons.
ai-patthana21.11:3.1_1: (They are) unconnected with preferences. Without the teaching they don’t give rise to unshakable thoughts.
ai-patthana21.11:3.1_2: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana21.11:3.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
